Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 11 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Fist, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 9 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Barlgura makes 3 attacks, one with its bite and two with its fists

Abilities.Ability 1: Innate Spellcasting, The Barlgura can innately cast a number of spells
Abilities.Ability 2: Reckless, At the start of its turn, the Barlgura can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, and all attacks against it have advantage until the start of its next turn
Abilities.Ability 3: Running Leap, The Barlgura's long jump is up to 40ft and its high jump is up to 20ft when it has a running start
